message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the oxidation of ethanol to ethanoic acid using potassium dichromate(VI) as the oxidizing agent under acidic conditions?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the oxidation of ethanol (C2H5OH) to ethanoic acid (CH3COOH) using potassium dichromate(VI) (K2Cr2O7) as the oxidizing agent under acidic conditions is:

C2H5OH + K2Cr2O7 + 4H2SO4 â†’ CH3COOH + Cr2(SO4)3 + K2SO4 + 7H2O
